title: Ep177 Thespian Crimes
description: This week, the gals break the fourth wall to investigate some grisly scenes of acting gone too far. Topics include a staged suicide, the dangers of method acting, and a busted bachelor party. Pop open a bottle of Winc's Time & Space Cabernet Franc, lower the house lights, and tune in for Thespian Crimes. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
